column2: we started with their garlic shrimp appetizer
column3: which came in a generous portion of 6 gorgeous
column4: plump shrimp in a decadent sauce. By the time we had worked though that
column5: our entrees had arrived. Between the two of us
column6: we split the lamb chops and a 10oz fillet
column8: which (given our choice in appetizer and bread) was a perfect amount for two to share - just enough to save room for dessert; the chocolate ice cream
column10: was a great way to wrap up our meal. I made the reservation to try this place after hearing about it from a coworker and
column12: it was completely worth the wait - I am very much looking forward to coming back
